text: What do you want you stupid Thief!
I am telling you I didnt steal your food.
Yeah, tell that to some other BOZO.
I know you are the one who did it.
But anyway, what do you want.
I wanted to ask you if you know some place, where I would able to get some medicine for the elder.
Why waste such valuables on a old geezer like him, When you could give it to me.
I would even pardon you theft.
It dosen't matter anyway because I dont know any place where you would be able to get the medine.
Except the TOP of course, but we bouth know none of us have that kind of money.
